video:video.video:description: As live and on-demand online video distribution grows so does the need for meaningful and timely analysis of consumption and quality of service. Microsoft Media Platform Audience Insight is a&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Introducing MMP Content Manager
video:video.video:description: So you want to stream live and on demand video? But how do you create it, stream it, edit it, manage it and monetize it? Come and see how the Microsoft Media Platform Content Manager pulls together&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Introducing Microsoft Media Platform (MMP)
video:video.video:description: The Microsoft platform for delivery of video and rich media experiences has fundamentally changed and grown significantly since the introduction of Silverlight and IIS Media Services several years&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Behind the Scenes of Channel 9 Live at MIX
video:video.video:description: During MIX11, the Channel 9 team will once again be broadcasting live to the web, in Smooth Streaming HD, with full interactivity, eight hours straight, for two days in a row. In this session,&#8230;

video:video.video:title: XNA Game Studio for Fun, Profit, Danger, Excitement and Windows Phone 7 Games
video:video.video:description: Ever wonder what it takes to create a top game for Windows Phone 7? Rob will show you how easy it is to get XNA programs running, whether you are a C# and Visual Studio newbie or a grizzled veteran of&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Riding the Geolocation Wave
video:video.video:description: It&rsquo;s pretty obvious by now that geolocation is a heavy player in the next wave of applications and APIs. Now is the time to learn how to take advantage of this information and add context to&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Mono: State of the Union
video:video.video:description: Come learn how Mono can help every one of your current projects: from our C# compiler as a service to running your .NET code on iPhone, Android and Mac. All demos will feature our amazing MonoDevelop&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Fonts, Form and Function: A Primer on Digital Typography
video:video.video:description: Typography in digital experiences is unavoidable, and for years it was a fight we mostly lost. Today, however, technology is on our side! High resolution screens, an expanding library of open fonts&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Flickr API: Tap Into Billions of Photos for Windows Phone 7
video:video.video:description: Do you want your app to integrate with one of the world&rsquo;s leading photosharing site? The Flickr for Windows Phone 7 app is a full featured mobile application that is pushing the boundaries of UX&#8230;
